content:
🔥 **Yes, Pro is the best choice for what we need.**  

📌 **Why Pro over Basic?**  
✅ **Unlimited drip campaigns** → More flexibility to test different audiences  
✅ **Full daily quotas** → Higher outreach volume = better results  
✅ **Export leads into CSV** → Helpful for tracking & optimizing engagement  

📌 **Why not Advanced?**  
🚫 **A/B testing** is useful, but we can manually iterate without paying extra  
🚫 **Webhook & Zapier integration** isn’t necessary at this stage  

💡 **Pro at $59/month is the best balance of features & cost.** **Go for it!** 🚀
